lexUnit.name: wear.v

corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

lexUnit.definition: COD: with obj. have on one's body or a part of one's body as clothing, decoration, or protection.
